section.title: Configuring a project
section.para:
Configuring a project consists in finding the parameters used during the build stop.
$ waf configure
The data is then stored in the folder c4che located under the build directory, like this:
build |-- c4che | |-- build.config.py | `-- default.cache.py `-- config.log
The configuration files are the following:
config.log: details of the configuration output build.config.py: default parameters such as waf modules used, and build directory information The files in *.cache.py are Python dictionaries (serialized instance of Environment)
